description: The NSQIP_PREOP_LABS table contains information about preoperative lab data. This table is used in conjunction with NSQIP_INFO to provide NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_LAB_COMPON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the lab component.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Serum Sodium (Na)


Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN)


Serum Creatinine (Cr)


Albumin (Alb)


Total Bilirubin (TB)


Serum Glutamic-Oxaloacetic Transaminase (SGOT/AST)


Alkaline Phosphatase (Alk Phos)


White Blood Count (WBC)


Hematocrit (Hct)


Platelet Count (Plt)


Internat'l Normalized Ratio (INR)


Partial Thromboplastin Time (PTT)


Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c)


Hemoglobin (Hgb)

columns.name: NSQIP_LAB_DT
columns.description: The date the lab was collected.

columns.name: NSQIP_LAB_UNKNOWN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the lab component value is unknown.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NSQIP_LAB_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the NSQIP preop lab unit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


mmol/L


mEq/L


mg/dL


umol/L


g/L


g/dL


U/L


K/mm3


Decimal


Percentage


Seconds


mmol/mol
